description: These waterproof-breathable ski pants are built with our most advanced thermal-reflective tech. Comfy, 60g insulation packs in an added layer of warmth. Internal leg gaiters, reinforced cuff guards, and added venting provides toughness and all-day breathability.
name: Columbia Sportswear Kick Turn III Pants, Reg - Mens

specs.value: 60g Microtemp XF II - 85% Recycled Polyester, 15% Polyester
